comunicazioni.contenuto:
Y = blum number (k-th power of a quadratic residue of (p*q))
K = the Kth-radix we want to obtain

((p+1)/4)K mod (p-1)
rp = Y mod p

((q+1)/4)K mod (q-1)
rq = Y mod q

r1 = inverse_modulo(q, p)
r2 = inverse_modulo(q, p)


r1 = r1 * q * rp;
r2 = r2 * p * rq;

result = (r1+r2)

(2i mod ((p-1)*(q-1)))
X mod (p*q)

Calcolo i-esimo blum a partire da X.
